Happy birthday, Thecode.

::Zardus::

Zardus raises an eyebrow.

"Training?"

Inwardly, Zardus swears. It was in his best interests to keep the maximals 
alive. Without the maximals to ally with if needed, he could be attacked by 
the predacons, possibly losing to them.

He turns to Liono. "Either way," he says, "Your troops need help. I am 
willing to send a few troops over ... as a show of good will."
